meanings.definition: A person who has been elected to a position.
meanings.sent1: The electee was excited to start their new role.
meanings.sent2: The school board announced the electee for the student council president.
meanings.sent3: The electee accidentally wore mismatched socks to their inauguration.
meanings.sent4: She stood tall, like an electee ready to lead the way.
meanings.sent5: The electee's victory speech inspired many to pursue leadership roles.

meanings.definition: The act of electing someone to a position.
meanings.sent1: The electee process involved voting by all members.
meanings.sent2: The electee of the new CEO took place smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The electee ceremony had confetti falling from the ceiling.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere was charged with excitement during the electee.
meanings.sent5: The electee marked a new chapter in the organization's history.
